fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier

Class DoublePegasosSVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier.DoublePegasosSVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier<double[]>, OnlineClassifier<double[]>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DoublePegasosSVM
extends java.lang.Object
implements OnlineClassifier<double[]>, java.io.Serializable

    Linear SVM classifier on arrays of double using the PEGASOS algorithm.

    Pegasos: Primal Estimated sub-GrAdient SOlver for SVM
    Shai S. Shwartz, Yoram Singer, Nathan Srebro
    In Proceedings of the 24th international conference on Machine learning (2007), pp. 807-814.

    Author:
    picard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
